description.english: So many shops, so little time!
Are they in there or not?
It's all shapes? Always has been.
It's dark. What does it do?
Around and around and around and around and around and around
Why are we fighting each other?
I REALLY want to touch it!
Fully decked out and ready to go!
So much work for.. a joke?
Don't forget there is a main story!
